entry.title: About
entry.content:
Hi, I am Ani and I wrote this epic collection of Interweb wisdom. In days of yore, much of this would have been deemed sorcery and I would probably have been burned at the stake.

entry.title: First Post on My Sweet New Blog
entry.content:
I am On My Way To my blog post for Internet Fame and Fortune!

This is my first post on my new blog. While not super informative it should convey my sense of excitement and eagerness to engage with you, the reader!
